ns0:entry.ns0:title: Raphire/Win11Debloat
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Raphire/Win11Debloat
Language: powershell
A simple, easy to use PowerShell script to remove pre-installed apps, disable telemetry, as well as perform various other changes to customize, declutter and improve your Windows experience. Win11Debloat works for both Windows 10 and Windows 11.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: anthropics/claude-code
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code
Language: powershell
Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: dartraiden/NVIDIA-patcher
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/dartraiden/NVIDIA-patcher
Language: powershell
Adds 3D acceleration support for P106-090 / P106-100 / P104-100 / P104-101 / P102-100 / CMP 30HX / CMP 40HX / CMP 50HX / CMP 70HX / CMP 90HX / CMP 170HX mining cards as well as RTX 3060 3840SP, RTX 3080 Ti 20 GB, RTX 4070 10 GB, and L40 ES.
